Nov 23 (Reuters) - Apple says in a statement:: *TO APPEAL ITALY ANTITRUST WATCHDOG'S FINE FOR ALLEGED COLLUSION WITH AMAZON, SAYS CO HAS DONE NOTHING WRONG

  • (Reporting by Milan newsroom)
